As a student that's owning much in government loans for my studies, I still feel I live a privileged lifestyle and would like to contribute what I can to help others in need. My parents were raised in Viet Nam and I grew up with stories of their humble lifestyle; so it feels nice to help someone who is similarly in my parents' previous situation to improve their life. We all deserve to live a life of happiness and freedom from financial worries.

“Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'”
- Martin Luther King, Jr

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because:
I can. 
But in reality, I loan money to third people less fortunate than me because: 
- it eases some of my white man guilt. Talk about being born with the odds on my side. Goes to show that its all just a roll of the dice whether someone begins life in poverty and has a good chance of remaining there for the rest of their life;
- it spreads my income around for mine and my family's contribution to the world's social and environmental problems; and
- I like to feel connected to the wider world in more ways by interacting with other people outside of my own country.
lenders.occupational_info: I listen to two sides of an argument about money, investments or insurance, and then help them discuss the main issues in order to find out whether they can agree. If they're unwilling or unable to agree, I then tell them how I think the argument should be resolved. Its up to them whether they agree with me or not. I must have some sense of what's fair and reasonable though because both people often do end up agreeing with me, and usually satisfied with the outcomes I help them get.

We are raising money to launch our product line this fall.

I have obtained a VERY reasonable rental property, with highend traffic volume.  But now towards the end, the plumbing, because of limited space for piping, is going to be expensive.  i need help with financing this final phase to go forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been in management for nearly 20 years, and after surviving the turmoil in my life of losing a loved one, I want to reopen my bakery/coffee shop business.  I have experience with working with the 'main street program', inwhich the focus is on creating an environment and events to bring your local community together.  That is our goal with trying to use other local businesses through our business.

lenders.name: Mobile Managing, LLC
lenders.occupational_info:
Thank you for your interest in doing business with Mobile Managing, LLC. We look forward to providing all of your administrative and contractual needs on an as needed basis. We have over ten (10) years of administrative and managerial experience, which primarily consists of working in the public sector of city government (operations and contracting). We work as independent contractors. Therefore, we are the solution to minimizing the overhead costs that some business and entrepreneurs face as a new start up or small business.

The advantage to this scenario is that our clients don't incur the additional costs of healthcare coverage for employees, paying a full time employee, rental of office space and other associated overhead costs. The other advantage is that our clients have the option to customize their own packages based upon their needs and/or the needs of their business. We offer a wide range of services that you are sure to benefit from. We work on an as needed basis to provide services to businesses and individuals using traditional and non-traditional means of communications via internet access, fax, telephone, mail courier services, file transfer, remote access and more.

Mobile Managing, LLC is your number one source for professional service. We surpass the competition in not only price but value as well. It is our mission to provide professional and quality virtual administrative, contracting and personal assistant services to individuals and businesses on a mobile basis, which means we come to you when you need us. As your personal Virtual Assistant (VA), we provide professional administrative, managerial, business office and personal/concierge services.

We use the most advanced means of communication and the newest and most efficient, time saving office products and work delivery regardless of geographical boundaries. Our assignments are on a contractual basis. As professionals, we abide by an established Code of Ethics requiring integrity, honesty and due diligence. Let us work with you to customize a package to fit your unique needs!

lenders.name: Fashion Fights Poverty
lenders.loan_because: FFP's mission is to raise awareness for initiatives that encourage and support creative, effective, and sustainable means of challenging poverty. We believe that the industries of fashion, textiles, and design offer unique and effective opportunities for designers, craftsmen, and consumers alike to contribute to the alleviation of poverty through trade, skill-building, and community empowerment.
lenders.occupational_info:
1. Support global projects that provide opportunities to artisans in developing countries
2. Showcase leading eco/ethical fashion designers in one of DC's premier runway shows
3. Support future design/fashion leaders locally and globally
4. Serve as a leading education resource to consumers and those in the industry

lenders.name: Austin

lenders.name: Aubrey and Chris
lenders.loan_because: We feel blessed to live the life that we do and feel that we should give back to the world community. Its a small but important way for us to help.
lenders.occupational_info: We are hadrworking Midwesterners trying to make a good life for our family and do something meaningful to help future generations. We believe that in order for us to live well someday, we first must help others.

lenders.name: M. Graca
lenders.loan_because: If I was in need I would like to have someone helping me. Helping each other we can grow a better world for everyone. We are a big brotherwood!
lenders.occupational_info: My main work is in the emergency rooms of a hospital, helping sick or injured people as a medical doctor. I like to see the other feeling better.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back
lenders.occupational_info: I truly understand what it's like to be without, except for me it wasn't so much the money, even though I struggled; but it was more from the loss of 3 of my 4 children. Back in 1981, 3 of my 4 children were killed in a helicopter crash along with one of my brothers, who was the owner and pilot of the helicopter. Just 2 years prior to that my husband, the father of our 4 beautiful children, passed very suddenly at the age of 37. I was a widow at 35 and within a year had to find work as we I could no longer support my family with no income. A year later I was left with just one of my children, and my world fell apart. I struggled in many areas of my life, which is why I can empathize with these beautiful people who simply want to "survive" and support their families. It's an honor to help out when I can, and I will continue to do so.

lenders.name: Seth Anderson
lenders.loan_because: I am also a small business

lenders.name: dina
lenders.loan_because: There is no support in our country and require a guarantor and not being able to open the project for lack of money , i need help .

lenders.occupational_info: I have just published a book titled, "Bush Medicine of the Bahamas: A Cross-cultural Perspective from San Salvador Island, including Pharmacology and Oral Histories."

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference, create more love and more peace in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as adjunct faculty working with future teachers at a university.

lenders.name: Charleen
lenders.loan_because: It makes my heart feel good to see people helping each other to reach their dreams and make a better place for themselves as well as others and too continue to be humble and generous with what they have been given from our Creator.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur changing goals, previous work was too expensive and the workers comp ate up all of the profit for our business, previously did forestry work but have recently decided to study to train as a Realtime Court Reporter, Broadcast Captioner, CART Provider and need help with getting the training manuals, stenomachine  and supplies to get started. I hope to have gained the knowledge to teach others the professional here on the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation so that they can have the opportunity to make a better place in society for themselves and their families.
